block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This Origami Bear designed by Kunihiko Kasahara is a little on the difficult side, but you should be able to fold it. This Origami Bear looks quite realistic. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
